option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Respond in conventional commit style

group.name: Refactor data definitions from 'apihelper.ts' to 'definitions.ts'
group.description: Centralize data type definitions in `definitions.ts` for better organization and consistency.

file.summary: Removes type definitions for `Release`, `Link`, `LinkResponse`, `ArtistResponse`, `EditArtist`, `Styling`, `Colours`, and `StylingGuaranteed` as they are moved to `definitions.ts`.
Adds type definitions for `Release`, `Link`, `LinkResponse`, `ArtistResponse`, `EditArtist`, `Styling`, `Colours`, and `StylingGuaranteed` by importing from `components` schema.
Updates import path for `Release` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `StylingGuaranteed` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `Release` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import paths for `AdminPages`, `ArtistResponse`, and `Release` types from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `Link` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `LinkResponse` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import paths for `ArtistResponse` and `Release` types from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `Link` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `ApiLink` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import paths for `Styling` and `StylingGuaranteed` types from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import paths for `ArtistResponse`, `EditArtist`, `Link`, and `Styling` types from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import path for `ArtistResponse` type from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import paths for `Link` and `Release` types from `apihelper` to `definitions`.
Updates import paths for `Colours`, `EditArtist`, `Link`, and `Styling` types from `apihelper` to `definitions`.

group.name: Add Zod schemas for 'releaseFormSchema' and 'editArtistSchema' validation
group.description: Implement Zod schemas for `Release` and `EditArtist` to enforce data validation.

file.summary: Adds `releaseFormSchema` and `editArtistSchema` using Zod for data validation, including a `hexRegex` for color validation.
Integrates `releaseFormSchema.safeParse` into `updateRelease` and `createRelease` functions to validate incoming `Release` objects, returning an error if validation fails.
Integrates `editArtistSchema.safeParse` into `updateArtist` function to validate incoming `EditArtist` objects, returning an error if validation fails.

group.name: Update 'ArtistForm.tsx' to display status messages with styling
group.description: Enhance `ArtistForm.tsx` to show styled status messages using `StylingContext`.

file.summary: Adds `StylingContext` import and usage to apply dynamic styling to status messages, and wraps the status message in a styled `p` tag.

group.name: Update 'README.md' with expanded project description
group.description: Expand the project description in `README.md` to clarify the project's purpose.

file.summary: Adds a new paragraph to the `README.md` explaining the purpose of linkr.audio.

group.name: Miscellaneous IDE Configuration Updates in '.idea/' files
group.description: Update IDE configuration files for developer tools and workspace settings.

file.summary: Updates `developer-tools.xml` to change the `lastSelectedContentNodeId` and add a new `developerToolConfiguration` for 'regular-expression-matcher'.
Updates `workspace.xml` with various changes including `cachedIndexableFilesCount`, `ChangeListManager` entries, `OptimizeOnSaveOptions`, `ProblemsViewState`, and `PropertiesComponent` keys.

list.name: Changes
list.comment: style(site): update header and button components, remove unused styles

list.comment: Expand the project description in `README.md` to clarify the project's purpose.

task.summary: Default task
auth works now
begin reimplementing auth

Implemented auth
use verifySession() to get current session from cookie added schema.d.ts built from openapi spec from bend
add logout, delete index
A Lot ! now looks decent. need to make links
resolve errors
update cloudflare. apparently will suppport next 16.1 in 2026
implement createRelease and add support for creating new releases across the app

Add Artist management support in Admin Dashboard
- Introduce Artist form with edit/save functionality. - Add navigation links for Admin pages in header. - Implement `updateArtist` action for server-side artist updates. - Refactor and enhance Dashboard and related components.
Clean up Header component styles and reformat imports in Release Form
Clean up Header component styles and reformat imports in Release Form
chore(api): Cargo update, .idea stuff
chore(api): Cargo update, .idea stuff
refactor(header): simplify Header component by removing popup logic and unused state
style(header): enhance admin navigation links with hover effects and padding adjustments
style(globals): add new gray color variables
refactor(artist-form): wrap save button in a flex container for improved alignment
chore(idea): update workspace and developer-tools settings
docs: add README to each directory.
chore(idea): update workspace
Make release pages look better
chore(idea): clean up workspace.xml and update recent branch/task history
feat(site): add cached getArtist, getRelease, and getLatestRelease functions
feat(site): redirect when going to {id}.url/
feat(api): support pagination in get releases for artists
refactor(release-page): improve layout styles and replace `<a>` with `<Link>` components
style(site): make images no longer draggable
chore(idea): add run configurations for development setup
feat(site): add noise overlay to release page and adjust z-index styling
style(site): update styling so it works on short screens
refactor(site): move components out of pages to be more modular. changed flavour text to scroll but idk if thats the vibe
feat(site): implement mobile support!
feat(site): animations, make artwork move with mouse and vinyl pop out yay
feat: Implement support for Styling object in APIs.
feat(site): support changing styling colours in artist admin area
style(site): change logo to <i> block so i can change background colour.
style(site): admin now responsive to artist styling
style(header): improve hover and active visual effects for admin links
style(site): update header and button components, remove unused styles
